page.title: 13Where to go in Kirkby
page.content: A tourist visiting Kirkby would stay at the three star Golden Eagle Hotel. Places to visit in the town are St Chads Church, Sports Centre and the swimming baths. Within easy reach of Kirkby is the Knowsley Safari Park, Croxteth Hall and many other historic buildings. Kirkby is just seven miles from Liverpool, and so it is very convenient to visit Beatle city, the Maritime Museum, Anfield, Goodison Park and many other places of interest. When tired of sight-seeing the visitor could walk in countryside and farmland which surround Kirkby and visit nearby villages such as Rainford or Bickerstaffe, for a meal and a drink.
